posts.post_content:
Hello Net54 community,

I'm actively trying to add to my T206 stamp collection, which is relatively modest, and am interested in purchasing any T206's with a "star" stamp. If you're open to parting with any that you have, please PM or contact me through email: [url]jennings.eric2017@icloud.com[/url]. Thanks!

...and Happy REA Bidding!

I may have a couple I can part with. 

Sent from my SM-N960U using Tapatalk
